thread.title: Primoris Services Corporation Announces Water Award Valued at $16 Million
thread.title_full: Primoris Services Corporation Announces Water Award Valued at $16 Million - Yahoo Finance

author: Primoris Services Corporation
title: Primoris Services Corporation Announces Water Award Valued at $16 Million
text:
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Primoris Services Corporation (NASDAQ Global Select: PRIM) (“Primoris” or “Company”) today announced a new water contract valued at $16 million with a municipal customer. The contract was secured by Cardinal Contractors, part of the East Construction Services segment. The work is scheduled to commence in the fourth quarter of 2015 and should be completed in the third quarter of 2017. 
The project consists of the construction of a new re-use treatment train for the City of Sunrise Florida’s Sawgrass facility. The upgrade will convert wastewater to re-use water, which can help reduce the demand for potable water. The work includes the construction of new deep bed media filters, disinfection, storage, and modifications to allow for distribution. The project scope includes a filter lift station, tertiary filters, disinfection station, a re-use storage lift station, re-use storage tanks, a high service pump station, an electrical building and a chemical feed facility. ABOUT PRIMORIS 
Founded in 1960, Primoris, through various subsidiaries, has grown to become one of the largest publicly traded specialty construction and infrastructure companies in the United States. Serving diverse end-markets, Primoris provides a wide range of construction, fabrication, maintenance, replacement, water and wastewater, and engineering services to major public utilities, petrochemical companies, energy companies, municipalities, state departments of transportation, and other customers. Growing both organically and through acquisitions, the Company’s national footprint now extends nearly nationwide and into Canada. For additional information, please visit www.prim.com .
